name: M.A.S.H. Royal Wedding
description:
Loved The Royal Wedding? Create Your Own Fairytale Wedding...

M.A.S.H. Royal Wedding takes the classic M.A.S.H game (mansion, apartment, shack, house) and gives it a royal wedding spin!

Go from being "Waity Katie" to marrying the prince of your dreams. Find out where you'll meet, who you'll marry, who will design your dress and more. From fashion to exotic locations-- this game has got it all!!

Everything is themed royal and the game includes all the hot spots Will and Katie loved to frequent. Find out about your path to being a princess- lots of happy fortunes to be had.
